sentences.en: “an ‘Action Program,’ which . . . looked to reduce tariffs on over 1,800 items”(&b{Alan D. Romberg})
sentences.cn: “一个…许诺削减1500种物品关税的‘行动计划’”(&b{艾伦D.龙伯格})

sentences.en: Banks are built to look solid to reassure their customers.
sentences.cn: 银行往往建得看上去很坚固，好让顾客放心。

sentences.en: Does this dress make my legs look too stumpy?
sentences.cn: 这条裙子会使我的腿看上去又短又粗吗？

sentences.en: From the way things look at the moment, the Republicans are unlikely to win this election.
sentences.cn: 照目前的形势来看，本届大选共和党获胜无望。

sentences.en: Gina covered her eyes, afraid to look.
sentences.cn: 吉娜捂住眼睛，不敢看。

sentences.en: He looked to hear from her.
sentences.cn: 他期望收到她的信

sentences.en: How do I look?
sentences.cn: 我看上去怎么样？

sentences.en: If you don't look out, you may fall on the ice. We looked out for each other on the trip.
sentences.cn: 如果不小心的话，你会在冰上摔倒的。我们在旅途中互相照看

sentences.en: If you look carefully you can see that the painting represents a human figure.
sentences.cn: 如果仔细看，就会看出画上是一个人形。

sentences.en: It looks like rain; Let's start for home.
sentences.cn: 天像是要下雨了, 咱们回家吧!

sentences.en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentences.en: It's fashionable but wearable, and it's easy to look after.
sentences.cn: 它既时尚又耐穿，而且容易打理。

sentences.en: Leather jeans that are too big will make you look larger.
sentences.cn: 过于肥大的皮裤会让你看起来块头更大。

sentences.en: Let me have a look at that – I think it’s mine.
sentences.cn: 让我看一下那个东西——我想它是我的。

sentences.en: Look for a change of weather in March.
sentences.cn: 希望三月天气会变

sentences.en: look up an old friend.
sentences.cn: 拜访一个老朋友

sentences.en: looked after his younger brother.
sentences.cn: 照顾他的小弟弟

sentences.en: looked on them as incompetents.
sentences.cn: 认为他们不胜任

sentences.en: looking for my gloves.
sentences.cn: 找我的手套

sentences.en: Mari tilted her head back so that she could look at him.
sentences.cn: 玛丽把头向后仰，以便能看到他。

sentences.en: Michael gave him a dirty look and walked out.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔狠狠地瞪了他一眼然后走开了。

sentences.en: My sister doesn’t look anything like me.
sentences.cn: 我妹妹长得一点也不像我。

sentences.en: Now look yonder, just beyond the wooden post there.
sentences.cn: 看那边，就在木头柱子的旁边。

sentences.en: She called her young son: "Here, Stephen, come and look at this!"
sentences.cn: 她喊她的小儿子：“喂，斯蒂芬，过来看看这个!”

sentences.en: She gave him a quick, upward look, then lowered her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她抬眼迅速瞥了他一下，然后眼睛又垂了下去。

sentences.en: She had the look of someone deserted and betrayed.
sentences.cn: 她一副遭人遗弃和背叛的样子。

sentences.en: Sir Denis took one look and sent it back.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯爵士看了一眼就把它送了回去。

sentences.en: The one thing I look forward to is going punting in Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 我期盼的一件事就是在剑桥乘坐平底船畅游。

sentences.en: The toy looks like a real dog.
sentences.cn: 那个玩具看上去像真正的狗。

sentences.en: Things are at last looking up.
sentences.cn: 情况终于有所改观

sentences.en: Very dark glossy lips look wrong with heavily made-up eyes.
sentences.cn: 涂有深色唇彩的嘴唇看上去和浓艳的眼妆不相称。

sentences.en: We sneaked out while Jessie’s mom wasn’t looking.
sentences.cn: 我们趁杰茜的妈妈没有看到，偷偷地溜了出去。

sentences.en: What did the man look like ?
sentences.cn: 那人长相如何？

sentences.en: When I look over and see Terry I tingle all over.
sentences.cn: 当我放眼望去见到特里时，我整个人兴奋不已。

sentences.en: You made me look really stupid in front of all my friends!
sentences.cn: 你让我在所有朋友面前出尽了洋相！

words.tran_cn: 检查员；观看者；美人（口语）
看；期待；注意；面向；看上去像

phrases.tran_cn: 游览；到处察看；到处寻找
俯视；向下看；用目光慑服某人；[股]看跌
很可能出现〔引起〕(某事、做某事)
认为，看待：用某种方式看待

phrases.phrase: look someone in the eye (或 face)

trans.tran_cn: （常为不悦时唤起他人注意）喂，听我说
看，查找，表情，考虑，外观，容貌，时尚
trans.tran_en: an act of looking at something

trans.tran_cn: 看，浏览，留心，看起来，好像，找寻，朝向
trans.tran_en: to turn your eyes towards something, so that you can see it

trans.tran_cn: 看， 瞧； 看起来； 注意
trans.tran_en: to turn your eyes towards something, so that you can see it
